We cite Bishop [@bishop2006pattern] and Friedman–Hastie–Tibshirani [@friedman2001elements].

title: simple_quarto_website
text:
Footnotes


The graduation images and video included in this page are from my own ceremony, serving as both a personal milestone and a professional motivation to continue excelling in data science.↩︎

title: My academic Journey
text:
Introduction
My name is Hillary Kouokam Metcheka AKA HillaryVIP. Welcome to the story of my academic journey. I just graduated in June 2025 from the University of Oregon and now I am getting my masters at Georgetown University. This slide deck is powered by Quarto + Reveal.js.
We reference Bishop (Bishop 2006) to show proper citation use.

title: My academic Journey
text:
Graduation Highlights
Two photos from my graduation:



Graduation Photoshoot, Eugene, OR





Graduation Photoshoot, Eugene, OR

title: My academic Journey
text:
Key notes

Consistency is key

Clear communication of results matters

Do what you love and passionnated about
Make time for yourself.









Bishop, Christopher M. 2006. Pattern Recognition and Machine Learning. Springer.
